input_args.passage: 'Rhys ap Tewdwr | Rhys ap Tewdwr (c. 1040 – 1093) was a king of Deheubarth in Wales and member of the Dinefwr dynasty, a branch descended from Rhodri the Great.'
input_args.claim: "Given the similarity in names and the fact that they were both leaders in Wales, it's reasonable to infer that Tewdwr ap Peredur may have been a king as well."
